title: Update website visual theme

requirements.text: Change the websiteâ€™s overall visual theme by updating the global design tokens (colors, radius, shadows, typography) so the site has a noticeably different but still professional, trustworthy, industrial look, and keep blue/purple from being the dominant colors.
acceptanceCriteria: Global theme tokens are updated in a single source of truth (e.g., CSS variables/Tailwind tokens) so the change applies site-wide.
Primary/secondary/accent/background/foreground/border colors are updated to a new cohesive palette and are not predominantly blue or purple.
Typography, border radius, and shadows reflect the updated theme and remain consistent across pages.
Text contrast remains readable in both light and dark modes (no low-contrast primary text on primary backgrounds).

requirements.text: Update key page sections and shared layout (Header, Footer, Home hero, and card-heavy sections) to ensure the new theme is applied consistently and any hardcoded color classes that conflict with the new tokens are adjusted to use token-driven styles.
acceptanceCriteria: Header navigation active/hover states still look correct under the new theme (no clashing backgrounds/foregrounds).
Footer background, borders, and link states match the new theme and remain accessible.
Home hero section remains visually strong with the existing hero image and updated theme colors; buttons and badges remain legible.
Cards (e.g., Services/Projects) still have appropriate hover/active styling consistent with the new theme.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn UI sources are read-only and must be composed, not edited).
Do not change backend behavior or schema; this request is theme-only.
Keep existing static generated images and paths intact (e.g., /assets/generated/*).
nonGoals: Adding new pages or new business features.
Changing existing user-facing copy/content beyond what is required to support the theme update.
Replacing or regenerating existing images (logo, hero, badge, project thumbnails).
